definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Shitanjing subdistrict of Dawukou district 大武口區|大武口区[Da4 wu3 kou3 qu1] of Shizuishan city 石嘴山市[Shi2 zui3 shan1 shi4], Ningxia
Shitanjing subdistrict of Dawukou district 大武口區|大武口区[Da4 wu3 kou3 qu1] of Shizuishan city 石嘴山市[Shi2 zui3 shan1 shi4], Ningxia

sentences.english: Late Carboniferous granite in the Xiao Hinggan Mountains shows magma-mixing characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 小兴安岭晚石炭世花岗岩具有明显的岩浆混合特征。

sentences.english: The Carboniferous volcanic rocks originated from partial melting of the crust.
sentences.chinese: 石炭纪火山岩为部分熔融作用的产物。

sentences.english: The Liangshang Formation mudstone is the direct cap rock of the Carboniferous gas pools.
sentences.chinese: 石炭系气藏的直接盖层是下二叠统梁山组泥岩层。

sentences.english: The reef enriches the Carboniferous reef types.
sentences.chinese: 丰富了石炭纪生物礁的类型。

sentences.english: The characteristics of carboniferous strata and milleral resources in guangxi were briefly in troducted.
sentences.chinese: 概要介绍广西石炭纪地层特征及矿产资源。

sentences.english: In the Jiyang depression, the main Carboniferous-Permian hydrocarbon source rocks are coals and dark mudstones.
sentences.chinese: 济阳坳陷石炭二叠系烃源岩主要为煤和暗色泥岩。

sentences.english: In Early Carboniferous, Tianshan mountains entered an intraplate evolution stage.
sentences.chinese: 从石炭纪开始天山地区进入陆内演化阶段。

sentences.english: The predicting effects are very good to Carboniferous strata in southwest Tarim basin.
sentences.chinese: 在塔里木盆地西南地区石炭系地层中，预测效果良好。

sentences.english: Late Carboniferous phylloid algal reefs developed on the carbonate platform margin in Ziyun County, Guizhou (South China).
sentences.chinese: 紫云晚石炭世叶状藻礁发育在碳酸盐台地边缘。

sentences.english: Carboniferous gas reservoirs are widely distributed in the east port of Sichuan Basin.
sentences.chinese: 川石炭系气藏广泛布川盆，已气藏。

sentences.english: In this paper, the structural micro-fissures of Middle Carboniferous in Eastern Sichuan are divided into three stages and four types.
sentences.chinese: 本文将川东中石炭统构造微裂缝分为三期四种类型。

sentences.english: There are three formation modes of Carboniferous gas pools in east Sichuan Basin.
sentences.chinese: 川东地区石炭系气藏属于箱外成藏。

sentences.english: The youngest strata intruded by the Kizil Tag intrusion are the Lower Carboniferous Gandun Formation.
sentences.chinese: 克孜尔塔格岩体侵入最新地层为下石炭统干墩岩组。

sentences.english: The geological age is assumed to be Early Carboniferous Tournaisian.
sentences.chinese: 为主，确定其地质时代为早石炭世杜内期。

sentences.english: Main stratums of exploration are Permian and Carboniferous.
sentences.chinese: 勘探层位以石炭系和二叠系为主。
